verses.name: Deuteronomy 21:6
verses.text: And all the elders of that city, that are next unto the slain man, shall wash their hands over the heifer that is beheaded in the valley:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 21:7
verses.text: And they shall answer and say, Our hands have not shed this blood, neither have our eyes seen it.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 21:8
verses.text: Be merciful, O Lord, unto thy people Israel, whom thou hast redeemed, and lay not innocent blood unto thy people of Israel’s charge. And the blood shall be forgiven them.
